title: "Reading: The disregarded superpower of our generation."
description: Elinor Ketelhohn, current high school freshman, is an avid reader. Through years of experience she has encountered 5 main benefits to be gained from reading on behalf of  individual and communities. She stresses how the beauty and power of literature has become disregarded, and calls for the public to wake up and realize the significance of the written word. Elinor hopes to encourage her audience to give reading a chance; to discover how essential it is to society, and to emerge as the better, more insightful, version of ourselves.
author: Elinor Ketelhohn
